name: Vegan Wellington
description: This show-stopping Vegan Wellington is beefy, hearty, and flavorful! Filled with lentils and vegan beef, this pastry-wrapped main is incredibly delicious and perfect for the holidays.
recipeIngredient: 12 ounce package vegan beef (I used Impossible)

recipeInstructions.name: Thaw puff pastry and preheat oven

itemListElement.text: Set the frozen puff pastry out to thaw while you prepare the filling. It will take about 30 minutes to thaw.
itemListElement.name: Set the frozen puff pastry out to thaw while you prepare the filling. It will take about 30 minutes to thaw.

itemListElement.text: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F and lightly grease a baking pan.
itemListElement.name: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F and lightly grease a baking pan.

itemListElement.text: In a large skillet, warm the olive oil over medium-high heat. Add the onion and sauté for about 2-3 minutes, then add the vegan beef.
itemListElement.name: In a large skillet, warm the olive oil over medium-high heat. Add the onion and sauté for about 2-3 minutes, then add the vegan beef.

itemListElement.text: Use a wooden spoon to break the "beef" into crumbles, and cook until browned.
itemListElement.name: Use a wooden spoon to break the "beef" into crumbles, and cook until browned.

itemListElement.text: Stir in the garlic and cook for 1 more minute.
itemListElement.name: Stir in the garlic and cook for 1 more minute.

itemListElement.text: Remove from heat, and add the thyme, sage, paprika, black pepper, soy sauce, Worcestershire sauce and quick cooking oats. Stir and set aside to cool for 10 minutes.
itemListElement.name: Remove from heat, and add the thyme, sage, paprika, black pepper, soy sauce, Worcestershire sauce and quick cooking oats. Stir and set aside to cool for 10 minutes.

itemListElement.text: Make your flax eggs - Stir the ground flaxseeds and water in a small bowl. Set aside to thicken for a few minutes.
itemListElement.name: Make your flax eggs - Stir the ground flaxseeds and water in a small bowl. Set aside to thicken for a few minutes.

itemListElement.text: In a large bowl, add the drained and rinsed lentils. Mash with a potato masher or fork until they are broken down a bit, but they shouldn't be pasty. Leave some texture. Add the slightly cooled mixture from the pan along with your flax eggs and stir well to combine.
itemListElement.name: In a large bowl, add the drained and rinsed lentils. Mash with a potato masher or fork until they are broken down a bit, but they shouldn't be pasty. Leave some texture. Add the slightly cooled mixture from the pan along with your flax eggs and stir well to combine.

itemListElement.text: Once the puff pastry is thawed, roll it out to about 9x12 inches.
itemListElement.name: Once the puff pastry is thawed, roll it out to about 9x12 inches.

itemListElement.text: Scoop the meaty mixture in the middle of the puff pastry. Leave an inch of space on all sides. Pack the filling tightly using your hands, into a loaf type shape.
itemListElement.name: Scoop the meaty mixture in the middle of the puff pastry. Leave an inch of space on all sides. Pack the filling tightly using your hands, into a loaf type shape.

itemListElement.text: Fold the sides of the pastry over the top of the mixture. Pinch and seal the edges. If needed, use a little water to help it seal.
itemListElement.name: Fold the sides of the pastry over the top of the mixture. Pinch and seal the edges. If needed, use a little water to help it seal.

itemListElement.text: Place the wellington on the prepared pan, seam side down. Handle gently.
itemListElement.name: Place the wellington on the prepared pan, seam side down. Handle gently.

itemListElement.text: Brush the tops and sides with melted vegan butter. Use a sharp knife to score the dough in a criss-cross pattern.
itemListElement.name: Brush the tops and sides with melted vegan butter. Use a sharp knife to score the dough in a criss-cross pattern.

itemListElement.text: Bake for 30-35 minutes until golden brown. Let cool for about 5 minutes before slicing and serving.
itemListElement.name: Bake for 30-35 minutes until golden brown. Let cool for about 5 minutes before slicing and serving.
